Texts.Eng: A large hulking pipe organ. I'd rather listen to the worst cantina singing than a recital on this .... device.
Texts.Chs: 大型笨重的管风琴。我宁愿听最差的酒馆唱歌，也不愿听关于这个的独奏会。。。。装置

Texts.Eng: An antique-looking Gothic-style organ. It looks suspiciously disused.
Texts.Chs: 一种古色古香的哥特式风琴。它看起来可疑地被废弃了。

Texts.Eng: An intimidatingly loud musical instrument operated by the use of keys, pedals and switchboards.
Texts.Chs: 用钥匙、踏板和配电盘操作的声音大得吓人的乐器。

Texts.Eng: Gothic organ. Very loud. Awful music. Auditory assault!
Texts.Chs: 哥特式风琴。非常大声。糟糕的音乐。听觉攻击！

Texts.Eng: Humans say that devices like these were once native to them -- how did the Glitch begin building these then?
Texts.Chs: 人类说，像这样的设备曾经是他们的原生设备——那么这个小故障是如何开始构建这些设备的呢？

Texts.Eng: I've heard of organs like these but this is the first time I've ever seen one. And one built by Glitch at that.
Texts.Chs: 我听说过这样的风琴，但这是我第一次看到。一个是由电子人制造的。

Texts.Eng: Its music is every bit as lugubrious and monstrous as its appearance.
Texts.Chs: 它的音乐和它的外表一样凄惨可怕。

Texts.Eng: Pipe organs do exist in Apex society, but they are very rare.
Texts.Chs: 管风琴确实存在于顶尖社会，但它们非常罕见。
